frozen_definition.name: FieldTap
frozen_definition.signal_source: Field worker complaints: 'construction teams don't have time to learn ropes of complex tools' and need 'simple, work on-site'
frozen_definition.description: Single-tap job tracking for field workers that requires no setup or training to start using immediately
frozen_definition.target_user: Blue-collar workers who need basic job tracking without learning complex software or dealing with complicated interfaces
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Workers report apps that 'complicate and add time to every job' with 'dated interface not intuitive'
core_loop: Single tap to start job timer
frozen_definition.differentiation: Zero-setup approach vs. configuration-heavy tools, optimized for immediate use without training
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes team coordination, detailed reporting, and payroll integration

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for individual use, premium for team features and advanced reporting
